title: [1.7.10][DivineRPG-神圣RPG][汉化] ◆新世界 魔法 强大的武器和防具◆
txt_content:
本帖最后由 784770286 于 2016-10-2 15:58 编辑 
[2015.10月25日更新]

该Mod为Nevermine 虚无世界的前作,原作者现在是开发虚无世界的人,此Mod为他人接手更新.
先上一下汉化图:
看着论坛内好长时间也没有人发布汉化版本,就花了点时间去填掉这个坑了。1.7.10汉化下载(进去文件夹,选择最新的版本号进行下载):http://pan.baidu.com/s/1nt056oL支持开发者:官方下载链接http://adfoc.us/3004301
更新日志:
 1.4.1.2:修复BUG.
1.4.1.1:艾瓦卡的体积更大了,增加冰封类木板,改进精湛套装的配方.
1.4.1:修复了大量的BUG.数种新生物,添加宠物蛋.
1.4.0.5:添加远古之力的雕像,修复梦魇木的贴图错误,地狱猪造成的崩溃。
1.4.0.4:削弱了钻石套装的效果,皮革套装添加属性,调整矿石的生成结构,削弱鲁比和阿勒米特的装备。
1.4.0.3:降低杰克的生成几率,添加俄语翻译。
1.4.0.2:降低柯尼的生成几率,独眼巨人现在只会在晚上生成。
1.4.0.1:修复阿里勘托的掉率,提高怪物的生成几率,修复一些武器的耐久度。
1.4.0:平衡性做了大量调整,暮光之城已经改名,删除没有意义的方块,神圣树在主世界生成,梦魇世界现在通过梦魇床去往。原文: 1.4.1.2:  Overlay GUI now stops displaying after 10 seconds
  Sky Flower now has a tooltip
  Halite Armor GUI no longer renders to all players in the area
  Fixed a Halite Armor issue when in inventory
  Fixed issue with the Kobblin
  Fixed shovels not mining modded dirt/grass
  Fixed Saguaro Worm spawning issues
  Reduced some code
1.4.1.1:  Fixed a bug when returning from Vethea where the player would appear at the lowest possible ground
  Made Ayeracos bigger.
  Fixed the blue Ayeraco spawn message
  Fixed some console spam leftover from forgotten debug code
  Changed degraded armor recipe, and made the Finished Helmet obtainable
  Added Frozen planks (Iceika), and Stairs and Slabs for all Planks
1.4.1:  Fixed torches being able to be placed on Arcana portal frame
  Fixed Arcana portal blocks dropping when replaced with water
  Fixed crops being unplantable
  Added saplings and wood planks for each twilight dimension
  Fixed problem with Ayeraco beams upon rejoining world
  Made Heliotic Beams breakable
  Fixed Ents spawning where a structure generates in Vethea
  Fixed a Frosted Chest rendering problem
  Renamed Endiku to Behemoth and moved it to the Wildwood
  New Eden mob: Sun Archer
  New Wildwood mob: Mage
  New Apalachia mob: Spellbinder
  New Skythern mobs: Mystic, Megalith
  New Mortum mob: Sorcerer
  New Overworld mobs: The Grue, Kobblin, Liopleurodon, Pumpkin Spider, Saguaro Worm
  New Overworld NPC: Livestock Merchant - Sells new Overworld pets: Ehu, Husk, Stone Golem, Smelter, Grizzle (brown/white), Snapper
  Better Rainbour animation
  Further optimized Vethea world generation
  Revamped Lady Luna. She can now clear trees and the acid she leaves on the ground can spray the player
  New Mandragora combat style, now shoots homing projectiles
  Fixed Fractites and Coris making Ghast sounds
  Improved Twilight Dimension archers' combat behavior
  Apalachia Golems can drop Purple Glowbone seeds too
  Stopped Crypt Keepers and Temple Guardians from despawning
  The Hive Queen now drops 17 cermile lumps
  Vethea bosses no longer spam everyone's chat in multiplayer
  Nerfed Lorga and Lorgaflight
  Fixed Vhraaks creating lag by multiplying when the world is rejoined
  Nerfed Kazrotic explosion power
  Fixed Raglok's bombs being blocked by the ceiling
  Fixed Merik's Missile rendering oddly in third person
  Fixed Shickaxes being ineffective against blocks from other mods
  New item: Serenade of Infusion, applies a regeneration effect to the player
  New materials: Terran shards/stones, liopleurodon teeth and skulls. Used to craft several new weapons, and terran lamps
  Divine Accumulator now displays particles for everyone in multiplayer
  Oredicted all of the planks
  Made coris less common
  Fixed Angelic Armor allowing infinite flight
  Clear the vethea spawn position of blocks so that the player can always respawn there
  Fixed vanilla weapon tooltips displaying the wrong attack damage
  New Overworld weapons: Terran Dagger, Terran Knife, Terran Maul, Aquatooth Sword, Aquatooth Maul, Liopleurodon Anchor, Jungle Rapier
  Fixed Degraded helmet and leggings recipes conflicting
  New Overworld item, Shadow Coins, used to buy pets from the Livestock Merchant
  New Armor set, terran
  Improved several sounds
  New crop: Sky Plant - Allows the player to breath underwater after eating it, and applied speed 2. Seeds dropped by megalith
  Fixed Vethean leaves being untextured
  New Vethean item: Miner's Amulet - Gives the player Haste III when in his/her inventory. Traded for 15 clean pearls
  The Nightmare Bed can now be used during the day, but always requires a dark room
  Nerfed Boheimite speed
  Nerfed Wildfire damage
  A few balance changes to some gear
1.4.0.5:
  Ancient Entity now drops statue
  Fixed Vethea log textures
  Fixed a crash causeed by Hell Pigs
  MCA compatibility
1.4.0.4:
  Diamond Armor is balanced better
  Made Leather Armor craftable again
  Changed some mob drops
  Tweaked ore spawnage
  Coris are fixed
  A couple other tweaks to mobs
  Fixed Shiny Pearls duplication bug
  Changed a few recipes
  Slight nerf to Rupee and Arlemite
1.4.0.3:
  Increased Jack-O'-Man rarity
  Better Russian translations
  Vethea logs now sometimes spawn Ents when broken
  Mobs now have the prefix DRPG on the Vanilla system to allow for compatibility with certain mods that add mobs
  Cyclopses now actually spawn only at night
  Fixes particles from projectiles not appearing when playing on SMP
  Changed lighting in Iceika to greatly increase performance
  Eden mobs drop cooked meat when killed if they were on fire
  Eden and Wildwood cadillions now spawn correctly
1.4.0.2:
  Decreased Cori spawn rate
  Cyclopses now only spawn at night
1.4.0.1:
  Fixed alicanto drops
  Increased spawner spawn rates
  Dark Bridge localization
  Fixed Enchanted Warrior's ears
  Fixed Halite Blade's tooltip
  Changed healing swords tooltips to be less confusing
  Increased Vethea pixel art amount
  Corrected some weaopn durabilities
1.4.0:
  Remade from scratch so most, if not all, bugs, glitches, and mistakes are fixed
  Rebalanced everything
  Twilight dimensions have been renamed
  Twilight dimensions have new terrain and generation
  Removed pointless blocks
  New divine trees in the Overworld
  Twilight Golem visually redone
  Visual changes to The Eye, Rotatick, and Cadillions
  Cadillions are now hostile
  New Wildwood mob: Epiphite
  Room in Arcana exclusively for the portal
  New Arcana trader: The War General
  Vethea is now accessed via the Nightmare Bed
  New Vethea item: Karos Rockmaul
  New GUI for update notifications
PS:自造词好多啊,脑洞不够用了.由于这是第一次汉化的版本,所以有翻译上的错误的话也是正常的,会在以后的更新慢慢改善,如果你们觉得有什么地方需要改进的话,希望在论坛上PM我.官方WIKI:http://www.divinerpg.org/wiki/Main_Page

相关教程:敬请期待

感谢Eternaldoom、RadioactiveStud、krwminer接手这个Mod.














[groupid=128]HAYO Studio[/groupid]
